trans-unit.source: Report templates

target.mrk: Modèles de rapport

trans-unit.source: Report Templates

seg-source.mrk: Report Templates

target.mrk: Modèles de rapports

trans-unit.source: A report template is used to configure the content of a report. This chapter explains how to:

seg-source.mrk: A report template is used to configure the content of a report.
This chapter explains how to:

target.mrk: Un modèle de rapport est utilisé pour configurer le contenu d'un rapport.
Ce chapitre explique comment :

seg-source.mrk: In the list of report templates, you can create a report template or select a report template, then:

target.mrk: Dans la liste des modèles de rapport, vous pouvez créer ou sélectionner un modèle de rapport, puis :

seg-source.mrk: Delete or duplicate a report template.

target.mrk: Supprimer ou dupliquer un modèle de rapport.

trans-unit.source: Create a Report Template

seg-source.mrk: Create a Report Template

target.mrk: Créer un modèle de rapport

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Define a name for the report template

seg-source.mrk: Step 1: Define a name for the report template

target.mrk: Étape 1 : Définir un nom pour le modèle de rapport

trans-unit.source: In the Server tab, go to Statistics & Reporting > Backup reports.

seg-source.mrk: In the Server tab, go to Statistics & Reporting > Backup reports.

target.mrk: Dans l'onglet Serveur, cliquez sur Statistiques & Rapports, puis sur Rapports de sauvegarde.

trans-unit.source: In the list of report templates, click .

seg-source.mrk: In the list of report templates, click .

target.mrk: Dans la liste des modèles de rapport, cliquez sur .

trans-unit.source: Define a name for the report template. By default, the name is New report template. The name of a report template can be defined during or after creation.

seg-source.mrk: Define a name for the report template.
By default, the name is New report template.
The name of a report template can be defined during or after creation.

target.mrk: Définissez un nom pour le modèle de rapport.
Par défaut, le nom est Nouveau modèle de rapport.
Le nom d'un modèle de rapport peut être défini pendant ou après sa création.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Configure the report template

seg-source.mrk: Step 2: Configure the report template

target.mrk: Étape 2 : Configurer le modèle de rapport

trans-unit.source: A report template can be configured during or after creation, using two tabs:

seg-source.mrk: A report template can be configured during or after creation, using two tabs:

target.mrk: Un modèle de rapport peut être configuré pendant ou après sa création, à l'aide de deux onglets :

trans-unit.source: The Report templates tab: This tab is used to define the content of the report.

seg-source.mrk: The Report templates tab: This tab is used to define the content of the report.

target.mrk: L'onglet Modèles de rapport : cet onglet permet de définir le contenu du rapport.

trans-unit.source: The Reports tab: This tab is used to schedule automatic reports.

seg-source.mrk: The Reports tab: This tab is used to schedule automatic reports.

target.mrk: L'onglet Rapports : cet onglet est utilisé pour programmer des rapports automatiques.

trans-unit.source: Edit the Report templates tab (see Table).

seg-source.mrk: Edit the Report templates tab (see Table).

target.mrk: Modifiez l'onglet Modèles de rapport (see Table).

trans-unit.source: Parameters in the Report templates tab

seg-source.mrk: Parameters in the Report templates tab

target.mrk: Paramètres dans l'onglet configuration du rapport

trans-unit.source: Option

seg-source.mrk: Option

target.mrk: Option

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Include the product name in the report title

seg-source.mrk: Include the product name in the report title

target.mrk: Inclure le nom du produit dans le titre du rapport

trans-unit.source: Displays the product name in the report title.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the product name in the report title.

target.mrk: Affiche le nom du produit dans le titre du rapport.

trans-unit.source: Language

seg-source.mrk: Language

target.mrk: Langue

trans-unit.source: Defines the language used for reports. Reports can be sent in English or French. By default, the language is the same as the language used on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the language used for reports.
Reports can be sent in English or French.
By default, the language is the same as the language used on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Définit la langue utilisée pour les rapports.
Les rapports peuvent être envoyés en anglais ou en français.
Par défaut, la langue utilisée est celle de la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Keep generated reports for

seg-source.mrk: Keep generated reports for

target.mrk: Conserver les rapports générés pendant

trans-unit.source: Defines the retention period for generated reports. By default, the retention period is unlimited.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the retention period for generated reports.
By default, the retention period is unlimited.

target.mrk: Définit la période de conservation des rapports générés.
Par défaut, la période de conservation est illimitée.

trans-unit.source: Show storage

seg-source.mrk: Show storage

target.mrk: Afficher le stockage

trans-unit.source: Displays the remaining space or space used for backup. This option is accessible to superadmins only.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the remaining space or space used for backup.
This option is accessible to superadmins only.

target.mrk: Affiche l'espace restant ou l'espace utilisé pour la sauvegarde.
Cette option n'est accessible qu'aux superadmins.

trans-unit.source: Show performance indicators

seg-source.mrk: Show performance indicators

target.mrk: Montrer l'efficacité

trans-unit.source: Displays the deduplication and compression rates, and the volume of protected and restorable data. This option is accessible to superadmins only.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the deduplication and compression rates, and the volume of protected and restorable data.
This option is accessible to superadmins only.

target.mrk: Affiche les taux de déduplication et de compression, ainsi que le volume des données protégées et restaurables.
Cette option n'est accessible qu'aux superadmins.

trans-unit.source: Show recently backed up agents

seg-source.mrk: Show recently backed up agents

target.mrk: Afficher les agents récemment sauvegardés

trans-unit.source: Displays data on agents that have been recently backed up.

seg-source.mrk: Displays data on agents that have been recently backed up.

target.mrk: Affiche les données sur les agents qui ont été récemment sauvegardés.

trans-unit.source: Show agents that were not recently backed up

seg-source.mrk: Show agents that were not recently backed up

target.mrk: Afficher les agents qui n'ont pas été sauvegardés récemment

trans-unit.source: Displays data on agents that have not been recently backed up.

seg-source.mrk: Displays data on agents that have not been recently backed up.

target.mrk: Affiche les données sur les agents qui n'ont pas été récemment sauvegardés.

trans-unit.source: Show agents that were not recently connected

seg-source.mrk: Show agents that were not recently connected

target.mrk: Afficher les agents non connectés récemment

trans-unit.source: Displays data on agents that have not been recently connected.

seg-source.mrk: Displays data on agents that have not been recently connected.

target.mrk: Afficher les données sur les agents qui ne se sont pas connectés récemment.

trans-unit.source: Show never connected agents

seg-source.mrk: Show never connected agents

target.mrk: Afficher les agents jamais connectés

trans-unit.source: Displays data on agents that have never been connected.

seg-source.mrk: Displays data on agents that have never been connected.

target.mrk: Affiche les données sur les agents qui n'ont jamais été connectés.

trans-unit.source: Agents inactivity threshold in days

seg-source.mrk: Agents inactivity threshold in days

target.mrk: Seuil d'inactivité des agents en jours

trans-unit.source: Defines the inactivity threshold for agents that have been recently backed up or connected.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the inactivity threshold for agents that have been recently backed up or connected.

target.mrk: Définit le seuil d'inactivité pour les agents qui ont été récemment sauvegardés ou connectés.

trans-unit.source: Select all/Unselect all

seg-source.mrk: Select all/Unselect all

target.mrk: Tout sélectionner/Désélectionner

trans-unit.source: Selects/Deselects all the options that display under this option. An additional column appears in the report when one of these options is selected.

seg-source.mrk: Selects/Deselects all the options that display under this option.
An additional column appears in the report when one of these options is selected.

target.mrk: Sélectionne/désélectionne toutes les options qui s'affichent sous cette option.
Une colonne supplémentaire apparaît dans le rapport lorsqu'une de ces options est sélectionnée.

trans-unit.source: Protected volume

seg-source.mrk: Protected volume

target.mrk: Volume protégé

trans-unit.source: Displays the data volume protected by <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the data volume protected by <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Affiche le volume de données protégé par <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Restorable volume

seg-source.mrk: Restorable volume

target.mrk: Volume restaurable

trans-unit.source: Displays the data volume that can be restored by <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the data volume that can be restored by <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Affiche le volume de données qui peut être restauré par <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Agent group

seg-source.mrk: Agent group

target.mrk: Groupe d'agents

trans-unit.source: Displays the group of agents managed by the same administrator.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the group of agents managed by the same administrator.

target.mrk: Affiche le groupe d'agents gérés par le même administrateur.

trans-unit.source: Strategy

seg-source.mrk: Strategy

target.mrk: Stratégie

trans-unit.source: Displays the strategy associated with the agents.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the strategy associated with the agents.

target.mrk: Affiche la stratégie associée aux agents.

trans-unit.source: Protection

seg-source.mrk: Protection

target.mrk: Protection

trans-unit.source: Displays the protection associated with the agents.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the protection associated with the agents.

target.mrk: Affiche la protection associée aux agents.

trans-unit.source: Last logon

seg-source.mrk: Last logon

target.mrk: Dernière connexion

trans-unit.source: Displays the name of the last user logged on the agent.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the name of the last user logged on the agent.

target.mrk: Affiche le nom du dernier utilisateur connecté à l'agent.

trans-unit.source: E-mail

seg-source.mrk: E-mail

target.mrk: E-mail

trans-unit.source: Displays the e-mail address provided by the user on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the e-mail address provided by the user on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Affiche l'adresse e-mail fournie par l'utilisateur sur l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Last started session

seg-source.mrk: Last started session

target.mrk: Dernière session commencée

trans-unit.source: Displays the last started session of backup.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the last started session of backup.

target.mrk: Affiche la dernière session de sauvegarde lancée.

trans-unit.source: Last completed session

seg-source.mrk: Last completed session

target.mrk: Dernière session terminée

trans-unit.source: Displays the last completed session of backup.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the last completed session of backup.

target.mrk: Affiche la dernière session de sauvegarde terminée.

trans-unit.source: Last connection

seg-source.mrk: Last connection

target.mrk: Dernière connexion

trans-unit.source: Displays the time at which the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> last contacted the server.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the time at which the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> last contacted the server.

target.mrk: Affiche l'heure à laquelle l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> a contacté le serveur pour la dernière fois.

trans-unit.source: Last synchronization

seg-source.mrk: Last synchronization

target.mrk: Dernière synchronisation

trans-unit.source: Displays the time at which the data to backup was sent to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server from the agent.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the time at which the data to backup was sent to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server from the agent.

target.mrk: Affiche l'heure à laquelle les données à sauvegarder ont été envoyées au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> par l'agent.

trans-unit.source: Edit the Reports tab (see Table).

seg-source.mrk: Edit the Reports tab (see Table).

target.mrk: Modifiez l'onglet Rapports (see Table)

trans-unit.source: Parameters in the Reports tab

seg-source.mrk: Parameters in the Reports tab

target.mrk: Paramètres dans l'onglet Rapports

trans-unit.source: Option

seg-source.mrk: Option

target.mrk: Option

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Contenu

trans-unit.source: Enable automatic e-mail report

seg-source.mrk: Enable automatic e-mail report

target.mrk: Activer l'envoi automatique de rapports

trans-unit.source: Defines whether the report should be sent automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Defines whether the report should be sent automatically.

target.mrk: Définit si le rapport doit être envoyé automatiquement.

trans-unit.source: <Schedule frequency> on <day of the week> at <server time>

seg-source.mrk: <Schedule frequency> on <day of the week> at <server time>

target.mrk: <Fréquence de planification> le <jour de la semaine> à <heure du serveur>.

trans-unit.source: Schedules the recurrence of the report. A report can be sent every day, week or month. A weekly report is sent on every Monday, whereas a monthly report is sent on the first day of the month.

seg-source.mrk: Schedules the recurrence of the report.
A report can be sent every day, week or month.
A weekly report is sent on every Monday, whereas a monthly report is sent on the first day of the month.

target.mrk: Planifie la récurrence du rapport.
Un rapport peut être envoyé chaque jour, semaine ou mois.
Un rapport hebdomadaire est envoyé chaque lundi, tandis qu'un rapport mensuel est envoyé le premier jour du mois.

trans-unit.source: Send mode

seg-source.mrk: Send mode

target.mrk: Mode d'envoi

trans-unit.source: Defines how the report should be sent. A report can be:

seg-source.mrk: Defines how the report should be sent.
A report can be:

target.mrk: Définit la manière dont le rapport doit être envoyé.
Un rapport peut être :

trans-unit.source: Enclosed as a file attachment.

seg-source.mrk: Enclosed as a file attachment.

target.mrk: Joint sous la forme d'un fichier en pièce jointe.

trans-unit.source: Embedded as a URL link.

seg-source.mrk: Embedded as a URL link.

target.mrk: Intégré sous la forme d'un lien URL.

trans-unit.source: Embedded as a static table.

seg-source.mrk: Embedded as a static table.

target.mrk: Intégré sous la forme d'un tableau statique.

trans-unit.source: Enter an e-mail address

seg-source.mrk: Enter an e-mail address

target.mrk: Saisir une adresse e-mail

trans-unit.source: Defines a list of recipients for the report. Each recipient should be separated by a comma. The SMTP Mail Service must been configured, otherwise the content of this tab will not be editable. For more details on the configuration of the SMTP Mail Service, see <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Defines a list of recipients for the report.
Each recipient should be separated by a comma.
The SMTP Mail Service must been configured, otherwise the content of this tab will not be editable.

For more details on the configuration of the SMTP Mail Service, see <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Définit une liste de destinataires pour le rapport.
Chaque destinataire doit être séparé par une virgule.
Le service de messagerie SMTP doit être configuré, sinon le contenu de cet onglet ne sera pas modifiable.

Pour plus de détails sur la configuration du service de messagerie SMTP, consulter <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Confirm the creation of the report template

seg-source.mrk: Step 3: Confirm the creation of the report template

target.mrk: Étape 3 : Confirmer la création du modèle de rapport

trans-unit.source: Click Create. A pop-up dialog confirms the report template is created.

seg-source.mrk: Click Create.
A pop-up dialog confirms the report template is created.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Créer.
Une fenêtre contextuelle confirme la création du modèle de rapport.

trans-unit.source: To delete a report template, as well as the reports associated with that report template:

seg-source.mrk: To delete a report template, as well as the reports associated with that report template:

target.mrk: Pour supprimer un modèle de rapport, ainsi que les rapports associés à ce modèle de rapport :

trans-unit.source: In the Server tab, go to click Statistics & Reporting > Backup reports.

seg-source.mrk: In the Server tab, go to click Statistics & Reporting > Backup reports.

target.mrk: Dans l'onglet Serveur, cliquez sur Statistiques & Rapports > Rapports de sauvegarde.

trans-unit.source: In the list of report templates, select a report template, then click .

seg-source.mrk: In the list of report templates, select a report template, then click .

target.mrk: Dans la liste des modèles de rapport, sélectionnez un modèle, puis cliquez sur .

trans-unit.source: Confirm the deletion of the report template. The list of report templates is automatically updated.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm the deletion of the report template.
The list of report templates is automatically updated.

target.mrk: Confirmez la suppression du rapport.
La liste des rapports est automatiquement mise à jour.
